description: After your creatures manually {ACTION_cast} a {CLASS_Life} spell, you gain 1 [infusion_life]Life Infusion. After any of your creatures manually {ACTION_cast} a spell, they heal your creatures for 10% of their {STAT_health} for each [infusion_life]Life Infusion you have, and gain a {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} that absorbs damage equal to the amount of {STAT_health} recovered.
name: Life Infusion
